summary: Custom Races see description for details.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][color=#ff0000][size=5]INTRODUCTION[/size][/color]

This Mod is a collection of Races.
No default assets are altered so this mod will be compatible with anything


Also Available in Skyrim SE

Check it out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3612/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3612/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3612/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3612/?]HERE[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/3612/?][/url]


[color=#ff0000][size=5]Description[/size][/color]


This mod adds a collection of the classic version of the default races.
 
It alsoadds a playable version of the Snow Elves, Half Giants, Half Ogre and Halfling.
 
It alsoadds a few new races of creatures using default assets so no texture or mesh
issues.
 
A final gift would be a few unmarked hidden bosses, beware traveler!

Version 1.1 Added Dermora Race, Fixed Error with Wolf Boss and Fixed Names Shown in Race Menu.

Version 1.2 Added Dwemer

Version 1.3 Added Half Orc, Half Elf and fixed Snow Elf.

All Races Have Full Vampire Compatibility

[size=4]OPTIONAL[/size]

By User Request there is a No extra creature version in optional files.
It removes the bosses and creatures from the leveled lists and leaves you with just the Playable races.
Should you want this version download it alone the main file is not needed.



Press the show button beside the word spoilers to see more details.

[spoiler]

[size=4]Playable Races[/size]

[size=4]Dwemer[/size]
Abilities: Conjure Dwarven Sphere, Advanced Intellect
Skills: Smithing 10, Enchanting 5, Block 5, One Handed 5, Alchemy 5, Alteration 5

[size=4]Dremora[/size]
Abilities: Resist Fire to 50%, Weakness Frost to -50%, Resist Magic to 16% And Resist Disease 25%
Soul Trap Starting Spell
Skills: Conjuration 10, Destruction 5, Heavy Armor 5, Block 5, Heavy Armor 5, Two Handed 5, One Handed 5
 
[size=4]Snow Elf[/size]
Abilities:Fortify Magicka 50, Resist Frost 50
Skills:One Handed 5, Block 5, Conjuration 5, Archery 5, Restoration 10, Sneak 5
 
[size=4]Half Elf[/size]
Abilities: Increased starting stats
Skills: One Handed 5, Archery 5, Pickpocket 5, Sneak 5, Alteration 5, Illusion 5 and Restoration 5

[size=4]Half Orc[/size]
Abilities: Beserker Rage
Skills: One Handed 5, Tow handed 5, Block 10, Smithing 5, Heavy Armor 5 and Light Armor 5

[size=4]Half Giant[/size]
Abilities:Increased Starting Stats
Skills:Light Armor 5, Heavy Armor 5, Two Handed 10, One Handed 5, Block 5, Smithing 5
 
[size=4]Half Ogre[/size]
Abilities:Resist Damage and Magic 25%
Skills:Two Handed 10, One Handed 5, Block 5, Heavy Armor 10, Smithing 5
 
[size=4]Halfling[/size]
Abilities:Luck and Increased Starting Stamina, No Two Handed Weapons
Skills:Sneak 10, Pickpocket 10, Speech 10, Lockpick 5, Light Armor 5, One Handed 5
 
[size=4]Classic Argonian[/size]
Abilities:Resist Disease 75% and Poison 100%
 
[size=4]Classic Breton[/size]
Abilities:+50 Magicka, Resistance 50%
 
[size=4]Classic Dark Elf[/size]
Abilities:Resist Fire 75% and Summon Ancestor
 
[size=4]Classic High Elf[/size]
Abilities:Resist Disease 75% and 25% to Elements
 
[size=4]Classic Imperial[/size]
Abilities:Star of the West
 
[size=4]Classic Khajiit[/size]
Abilities:Eye of Fear
 
[size=4]Classic Nord[/size]
Abilities:Added 25% Shock Resistance
 
[size=4]Classic Orc[/size]
Abilities:Magic Resistance 25%
 
[size=4]Classic Red Guard[/size]
Abilities:Poison Resistance 75%
 
[size=4]Classic Wood Elf[/size]
Abilities:Animal Command Duration 600 Seconds
 
 
[size=4]New Creatures[/size]
 
All added to the Leveled List
 
Skittish Troll
 
Skittish Frost Troll
 
Demented Deer
 
Deranged Goat
 
Rabid Rabbit



 
[size=4]Hidden Bosses[/size]
 
Inabba The Rabit:  North of Helgen
 
Mr.Crabby the Mudcrab:  South East of  The Lady Stone (Under Water)
 
Mr.Winkey The Rat: North of Loreius Farm
 
Hopalong The Horker: South of Septimus Signus’s Outpost
 
Crazed Chaurus: In Blackreach
 
Sketchy Sabercat: South East of Rorikstead
 
Fiend Fox:On the Cliff above Falkreath
 
Wholly Wolf: South of Mecko’s Shack
 

[/spoiler]



[color=#ff0000][size=5]FAQ[/size][/color]

Will this work with (Insert mod here)?

Yes it will work, this mod creates custom races and animals using default assets
and does not alter the stock files in any way.

[color=#ff0000][size=5]INSTALLATION[/size][/color]

Use NMM, or simply unzip the contents of the file into your Skyrim Data Folder


[color=#ff0000][size=5]COMPATIBILITY[/size][/color]

This Mod should be compatible with just about everything should you find an error, Message me and I will patch it as soon as possible.

User Suggestion from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4916384]lued123[/url]: People should use Wrye Bash if they have something that edits the same level lists.


Enjoy!
Hope ya like the mod, Happy Gaming!

SidePannel
